post.text: I rarely agree with President Obama- however he is 100% correct about Crooked Hillary Clinton. Great ad!

comment.author: Trent
comment.text: Alright everybody, I think it's safe to say that Mr. Trump has officially started on Crooked Hillary. I love this election Donald, you have my vote 100% come November! #Trump2016

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: And under budget! Brilliant to use old ads!!!

replies.author: Trent
replies.text: Ads that have already been shown to be effective! Even more so because of today's endorsement! Basically, a brilliant move all around!
